data.title: The Prince Of Persia Remake’s Graphics Disaster
data.meta_description: French Video Game Company Ubisoft has announce the release date of the “Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time” Remakegame remake in a Ubisoft Forward event on September 10 which was met with high…
data.text:
What You need to know

Ubisoft has Officially announced that Prince Of Persia:Sands Of Time Remake will be released out on 21 January.

The Game would be arrive for Xbox One,PC and PlayStation.Also it is playable on both PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X via backward compatibility

Gaming Community were hugely Disappointed with the Graphics of the game.

Indian Ubisoft Studios(Ubisoft mumbia and Ubisoft Pune) are leadiing the development of the remake.

French Video Game Company Ubisoft has announce the release date of the “Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time” Remakegame remake in a Ubisoft Forward event on September 10 which was met with high enthusiasm from the gaming community.And the die hard fans expectations were on the cloud nine.

This is the Ubisoft’s first ever full-fledged remake which took around 2 complete years for the complete remake of the orginal game.Indian Ubisoft studios of Mumbai and Pune have be entrusted with task of game development ,which could be a sign that Indian Studios are ready for going hand in hand with competative game development industry.Although the Pune Studio was acquired from the gameloft in the year of 2008 and Mumbai studio was set up few years ago.

Jean-Philippe Pieuchot who is the Ubisoft Indian Studio managing director has claims it is the culmination of the first of a kind end-to-end console produciton from India:”With this remark Ubisoft has pioneered AAA expertise in India”.

In a published interview on the Ubisoft News website, the game director told that, “But we rebuilt everything from the ground up, because no files were actually usable because of the engine; we are using Anvil, which was used for Assassin’s Creed Origins.”

AAAA games are those games which have a high development and marketing budget, usually utilises the most modern graphics and technology.

What went Wrong with the graphics ?

While with the announcement of the 17 year old game Prince Of Persia:Sands of Time original game remake met with the high expectation ,but most of the fans became disappointed with the graphics of the game as seen in the yesterday trailer.
